content.p: On this webpage you will find regulations governing the payment of fees and other sums due to the university, and those governing attendance, conduct and progress in studies. When you register, you are agreeing to a written contract to act in accordance with these ordinances and regulations during your period of study. Regulations are available by following the buttons below. The University of Nottingham quality manual is a central source of information for policies and procedures which support the university in its aim to assure the quality of its learning, teaching and supervision.
